definition: (old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: The architectural heritage of the French kings is nowhere as present as in the Loire Valley.
sentences.chinese: 法國國王的建築遺產，是因爲目前無處在盧瓦爾河谷。

sentences.english: Visit medieval castles in Normandy and the Loire Valley.
sentences.chinese: 在諾曼底參觀中世紀城堡和盧瓦爾河谷。

sentences.english: near the Chateau de La Loire, quite, well, not far.
sentences.chinese: 挨着盧瓦爾河谷城堡羣，很近。

sentences.english: But the Loire is so shallow, paddling is about as far as bathing goes.
sentences.chinese: 但是盧瓦爾河很淺，划船大約只能像洗澡走那麼遠。

sentences.english: Water is everywhere here between the sea and the Loire itself.
sentences.chinese: 從大海到盧瓦爾河，水漫延在這裏的任何地方。
